tool.name: OGS: createLayeredMeshFromRasters
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'createLayeredMeshFromRasters'.

param.name: ascii_output
param.label: ascii output
param.help: Write VTU output in ASCII format.

param.name: thickness
param.label: thickness
param.help: The minimum thickness of a layer to be integrated at any given location.

param.name: raster_list
param.label: raster list
param.help: An ascii-file containing a list of raster files, starting from top (DEM) to bottom.

param.name: keep_surface_material_ids
param.label: keep surface material ids
param.help: if the argument is present the materials defined in the surface mesh are used to set the material information for the subsurface cells

tool.help: This tool runs the **createLayeredMeshFromRasters** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
